artist: Artist: after Hendrick Goltzius; Engraver: Jan Saenredam; Publisher: Jan Jansson
description: woman holding covered jar, crying; banquet table in background
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription 

in plate in black upper right: [H. Goltzius invent  J. Saenredam sculp/I];  below image in black: [two lines in Latin (Illa pedus...mento dolet)/ Joannes Janssonius excudit Balthazarus Schoneus]; on sheet in pencil: [1-485]
portfolio: From Famous Women of the New Testament
title: St. Mary Magdalene
